summary: TypeScript SDK v1.12.2 introduces a regression where worker heartbeats fail with permission denied errors when connecting to Temporal Cloud with API keys, causing workers to crash in production despite working in local dev environments.
userImpact: Production workers crash immediately after upgrading to v1.12.2 when using API key authentication with Temporal Cloud.
rootCause: A change to worker heartbeat logic between v1.12.1 and v1.12.2 introduced a regression that causes permission validation failures with API key-based connections.
keyQuote: Network error while sending worker heartbeat... PermissionDenied, message: "Request unauthorized."
